channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Flytip at Location - added to!, 24th February
item.description:
The location is the entrance to the Old Quarry off Cleeve Common Road - the entrance to the footpath. A report of a tip here was made earlier this week which consists of wood, glass door, perspex roofing and plastic chairs. Another part is car parts. It does seem this tip has been added to. Please can this be removed as a matter of urgency?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Dingle, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog poo outside school, 24th February
item.description:
Dog poo on pavement outside school

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 14 Jersey Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bin needs emptying, 23rd February
item.description:
Please can you arrange for this bin to be emptied? Thank you!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 41 Church Street, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vegetation growing over path, 22nd February
item.description:
Hi Reporting this on behalf of someone else: Path in front of Ramada Hotel, GL51 0ST being swamped with undergrowth causing an obstruction and making the path unusable for wheelchairs, pushchairs etc and forcing pedestrians onto a busy road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): B4063, Staverton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Constant Failing Stretch of Road, 22nd February
item.description:
This section of road has been reported by myself and others on multiple occasions. While quick patches might work cosmetically there is clearly an issue with the road sub base here or it would not keep falling. I noticed marks to indicate that you must be aware, but you do really need to dig down and find out why this section keeps failing.!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 323 Innsworth Lane, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pot hole at the end of Acomb crescent and bend of Glenfall way in the opposite side on the corner, 21st February
item.description:
Potholes pushing traffic into the centre of the road on a bend
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Acomb Crescent, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road condition, 21st February
item.description:
Stretch of road in unbelievably poor order from mini roundabout to the cross road lights
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 55 Shurdington Road, Cheltenham

item.title: General rubbish dumping, 21st February

Litter strewn along the verge between laburnham Court and Springbank Stores along Springbank Road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 21 Aston Grove, Cheltenham

item.title: Dumped settee, 21st February
item.description:
This appeared overnight on Springbank Road opposite Springbank Grove

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 118 Springbank Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Sunken gully and cover - end of Chatsworth Drive, 20th February
item.description:
The subs-surface below the gulley has sunk and allowed the whole drain to collapse. We have been told that the whole road is due for re-surfacing, but this will need to be fixed beforehand.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 196 Leckhampton Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large Flytip at Location - Again!, 20th February
item.description:
The location is the entrance to thew Old Quarry off Cleeve Common Road - both sides of the entrance. The tip consists of wood, glass door, perspex roofing and plastic chairs. Another part is car parts. Please can this be removed as a matter of urgency.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Dingle, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 potholes, 20th February

1 x 1.5m x 0.75m 1 x 0.5m x 0.5m

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Lobleys Drive, Hucclecote

item.title: Road needs resurfacing, 20th February
item.description:
The entire stretch of road is covered in potholes making it almost undriveable. This has been the case for more than 6 months now
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Unit U1 Kingsville Road, Kingsditch Trading Estate
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Weak point threatening integrity of surface dressing, 19th February
item.description:
The road was very effectively surface dressed some years ago, and the surfacing remains generally good. However, in a few places the surfacing is threatened by deterioration such as this.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 19 Collum End Rise, Leckhampton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dismantled kitchen, 19th February
item.description:
There's a load of cupboards, wood etc, been dumped in the end car park in Coppice Gate.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 76 Coppice Gate, Cheltenham

item.title: River cleaning - DOLL and plastic waste, 18th February
item.description:
So much rubbish in the river. Further down from doll there is a huge bundle of cardboard.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 135 Carter Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Severely damaged road, 17th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 177 Leckhampton Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Shocking road surface - many areas, 17th February
item.description:
Shocking road surface - many areas. The badly broken surface extends all the way along priors road. It's dangerous as motorists swerve to avoid the areas. Major repairs are urgently needed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 246 Priors Road, Prestbury
Report on FixMyStreet
